I am grateful for my health and my ability to enjoy the outdoors.
I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart.
I am not happy in my job or marriage.
i have bad luck with relationships.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy teaching my students about the world and helping them grow into their best selves.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
I wash my clothes weekly.
i am a runner.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, too. I am grateful for my health and my ability to enjoy the outdoors.
That is great! I am also grateful for my health. I enjoy teaching my students about the world and helping them grow into their best selves.
That sounds like a very rewarding job! I am not happy in my job or marriage. I have bad luck with relationships.
I am sorry to hear that. I hope things improve for you. I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
That is exciting! I hope you find a new job that you enjoy. I like to listen to upbeat music to keep me energetic when I am running errands with my family or racing my go kart.
That sounds like a fun way to spend time with your family! I am a runner, too. I wash my clothes weekly.
I wash my clothes weekly as well. Do you have any fun hobbies?
I am applying for publishing jobs. I enjoy reading and writing.
That sounds like a great hobby! I like to read and write as well. I am also a musician
